content.question: Insects destroyed a crop at the rate of <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mfrac> <mrow> <mn>100</mn><msup> <mi>e</mi> <mrow> <mo>−</mo><mn>0.1</mn><mi>t</mi> </mrow> </msup> </mrow> <mrow> <mn>2</mn><mo>−</mo><msup> <mi>e</mi> <mrow> <mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>t</mi> </mrow> </msup> </mrow> </mfrac> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4360@</annotation> </semantics> </math> tons per day, where time t is measured in days. To the nearest ton, how many tons did the insects destroy during the time interval <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mn>7</mn><mo>≤</mo><mi>t</mi><mo>≤</mo><mn>14</mn> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3CB1@</annotation> </semantics> </math>?
